complimentary.translation[0].definitions: There was a complimentary bottle of champagne in the hotel room.
I’ve got some complimentary tickets for the theatre tonight.
saying that you admire someone or something
Jennie was very complimentary about Katharine’s riding.
complimentary.translation[1].definitions: complimentary food, goods, services etc are given free to customers or clients
You will receive a complimentary bottle of wine on arrival at your hotel.
